title: My Gaming Setup Evolution
brief: From humble beginnings to a full-fledged gaming station
content: Over the years, my gaming setup has evolved significantly. Starting with a basic laptop to now having a dedicated gaming PC with multiple monitors, the journey has been quite exciting. In this post, I'll share the key components of my current setup and some tips for those looking to build their own gaming station. The focus is on finding the right balance between performance and budget.
